description: Italian children miss school, adults miss outdoor life, as Dany Mitzman reports.
title: Coronavirus: Surviving lockdown blues in an Italian village
title_page: Coronavirus: Surviving lockdown blues in an Italian village - BBC News
maintext: We grown-ups can't wait for the day we'll be able to greet each other again with the traditional Italian kiss on both cheeks. Our kids can't wait for the day they'll be able to moan about having to get up early for school.
